text: Kiron is a city in Iowa in the United States. Kiron was founded in 1899, built around the railroad that used to go through Kiron. Today, Kiron is a very small community, and in 2020 the population was 267. Kiron has 2 parks, the "Living Memory Park" (located on the south side of town) and the "North Park" (located on the north side of town). Kiron also has a small fire department, but no police station. The fire department also has an ambulance. == References == Category:Crawford County, Iowa Category:Cities in Iowa
title: Kiron, Iowa
